076@Category(SmallTests.class)
077public class TestProtobufUtil {
078  @ClassRule
079  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
080    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestProtobufUtil.class);
081  private static final String TAG_STR = "tag-1";
082  private static final byte TAG_TYPE = (byte) 10;
083  private static final HBaseProtos.ServerName SERVER_NAME =
084    HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder().setHostName("a.b.com").build();
085  private static final HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier REGION =
086    HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.newBuilder().setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("test"))
087      .setType(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME).build();
088
089  public TestProtobufUtil() {
090  }
091
092  @Test
093  public void testException() throws IOException {
094    NameBytesPair.Builder builder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
095    final String omg = "OMG!!!";
096    builder.setName("java.io.IOException");
097    builder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(omg)));
098    Throwable t = ProtobufUtil.toException(builder.build());
099    assertEquals(omg, t.getMessage());
100    builder.clear();
101    builder.setName("org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RemoteException");
102    builder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(omg)));
103    t = ProtobufUtil.toException(builder.build());
104    assertEquals(omg, t.getMessage());
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Test basic Get conversions.
109   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Get} fails
110   */
111  @Test
112  public void testGet() throws IOException {
113    ClientProtos.Get.Builder getBuilder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder();
114    getBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
115    Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
116    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
117    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
118    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
119    getBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
120
121    columnBuilder.clear();
122    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f2"));
123    getBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
124    getBuilder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(true);
125    ClientProtos.Get proto = getBuilder.build();
126    // default fields
127    assertEquals(1, proto.getMaxVersions());
128    assertEquals(true, proto.getCacheBlocks());
129
130    // set the default value for equal comparison
131    getBuilder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder(proto);
132    getBuilder.setMaxVersions(1);
133    getBuilder.setCacheBlocks(true);
134    getBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(TimeRange.allTime()));
135    getBuilder.setQueryMetricsEnabled(false);
136    Get get = ProtobufUtil.toGet(proto);
137    assertEquals(getBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toGet(get));
138  }
139
140  /**
141   * Test Delete Mutate conversions.
142   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Delete} or a
143   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
144   */
145  @Test
146  public void testDelete() throws IOException {
147    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
148    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
149    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.DELETE);
150    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(111111);
151    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
152    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
153    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
154    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
155    qualifierBuilder.setDeleteType(DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION);
156    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(111222);
157    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
158    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
159    qualifierBuilder.setDeleteType(DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS);
160    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(111333);
161    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
162    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
163
164    MutationProto proto = mutateBuilder.build();
165    // default fields
166    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
167
168    // set the default value for equal comparison
169    mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
170    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
171
172    Delete delete = ProtobufUtil.toDelete(proto);
173
174    // delete always have empty value,
175    // add empty value to the original mutate
176    for (ColumnValue.Builder column : mutateBuilder.getColumnValueBuilderList()) {
177      for (QualifierValue.Builder qualifier : column.getQualifierValueBuilderList()) {
178        qualifier.setValue(ByteString.EMPTY);
179      }
180    }
181    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete));
182  }
183
184  /**
185   * Test Put Mutate conversions.
186   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Put} or a
187   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
188   */
189  @Test
190  public void testPut() throws IOException {
191    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
192    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
193    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.PUT);
194    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(111111);
195    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
196    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
197    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
198    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
199    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v1"));
200    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
201    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
202    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v2"));
203    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(222222);
204    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
205    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
206
207    MutationProto proto = mutateBuilder.build();
208    // default fields
209    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
210
211    // set the default value for equal comparison
212    mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
213    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
214
215    Put put = ProtobufUtil.toPut(proto);
216
217    // put value always use the default timestamp if no
218    // value level timestamp specified,
219    // add the timestamp to the original mutate
220    long timestamp = put.getTimestamp();
221    for (ColumnValue.Builder column : mutateBuilder.getColumnValueBuilderList()) {
222      for (QualifierValue.Builder qualifier : column.getQualifierValueBuilderList()) {
223        if (!qualifier.hasTimestamp()) {
224          qualifier.setTimestamp(timestamp);
225        }
226      }
227    }
228    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, put));
229  }
230
231  /**
232   * Test basic Scan conversions.
233   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan} fails
234   */
235  @Test
236  public void testScan() throws IOException {
237    ClientProtos.Scan.Builder scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder();
238    scanBuilder.setStartRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row1"));
239    scanBuilder.setStopRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row2"));
240    Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
241    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
242    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
243    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
244    scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
245
246    columnBuilder.clear();
247    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f2"));
248    scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
249
250    ClientProtos.Scan proto = scanBuilder.build();
251
252    // Verify default values
253    assertEquals(1, proto.getMaxVersions());
254    assertEquals(true, proto.getCacheBlocks());
255
256    // Verify fields survive ClientProtos.Scan -> Scan -> ClientProtos.Scan
257    // conversion
258    scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder(proto);
259    scanBuilder.setMaxVersions(2);
260    scanBuilder.setCacheBlocks(false);
261    scanBuilder.setCaching(1024);
262    scanBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(TimeRange.allTime()));
263    scanBuilder.setIncludeStopRow(false);
264    scanBuilder.setQueryMetricsEnabled(false);
265    ClientProtos.Scan expectedProto = scanBuilder.build();
266
267    ClientProtos.Scan actualProto = ProtobufUtil.toScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(expectedProto));
268    assertEquals(expectedProto, actualProto);
269  }
270
271  @Test
272  public void testToCell() {
273    KeyValue kv1 =
274      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("aaa"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
275    KeyValue kv2 =
276      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("bbb"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
277    KeyValue kv3 =
278      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("ccc"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
279    byte[] arr = new byte[kv1.getLength() + kv2.getLength() + kv3.getLength()];
280    System.arraycopy(kv1.getBuffer(), kv1.getOffset(), arr, 0, kv1.getLength());
281    System.arraycopy(kv2.getBuffer(), kv2.getOffset(), arr, kv1.getLength(), kv2.getLength());
282    System.arraycopy(kv3.getBuffer(), kv3.getOffset(), arr, kv1.getLength() + kv2.getLength(),
283      kv3.getLength());
284    ByteBuffer dbb = ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(arr.length);
285    dbb.put(arr);
286    ByteBufferKeyValue offheapKV = new ByteBufferKeyValue(dbb, kv1.getLength(), kv2.getLength());
287    CellProtos.Cell cell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(offheapKV, false);
288    Cell newOffheapKV = ProtobufUtil
289      .toCell(ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY), cell, false);
290    assertTrue(CellComparatorImpl.COMPARATOR.compare(offheapKV, newOffheapKV) == 0);
291  }
292
293  /**
294   * Test Increment Mutate conversions.
295   * @throws IOException if converting to an {@link Increment} or
296   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
297   */
298  @Test
299  public void testIncrement() throws IOException {
300
301    MutationProto proto = getIncrementMutation(111111L);
302    // default fields
303    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
304
305    // set the default value for equal comparison
306    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
307    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
308
309    Increment increment = ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(proto, null);
310    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(increment.getTimestamp());
311    mutateBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(increment.getTimeRange()));
312    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment));
313  }
314
315  private MutationProto getIncrementMutation(Long timestamp) {
316    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
317    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
318    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationProto.MutationType.INCREMENT);
319    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
320    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
321    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
322    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
323    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(11L)));
324
325    if (timestamp != null) {
326      qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
327    }
328
329    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
330    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
331    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(22L)));
332    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
333    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
334
335    return mutateBuilder.build();
336  }
337
338  /**
339   * Older clients may not send along a timestamp in the MutationProto. Check that we default
340   * correctly.
341   */
342  @Test
343  public void testIncrementNoTimestamp() throws IOException {
344    MutationProto mutation = getIncrementMutation(null);
345    Increment increment = ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(mutation, null);
346    assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, increment.getTimestamp());
347    increment.getFamilyCellMap().values().forEach(cells -> cells
348      .forEach(cell -> assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, cell.getTimestamp())));
349  }
350
351  /**
352   * Test Append Mutate conversions.
353   * @throws IOException if converting to an {@link Append} fails
354   */
355  @Test
356  public void testAppend() throws IOException {
357    MutationProto proto = getAppendMutation(111111L);
358    // default fields
359    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
360
361    // set the default value for equal comparison
362    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
363    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
364
365    Append append = ProtobufUtil.toAppend(proto, null);
366
367    // append always use the latest timestamp,
368    // reset the timestamp to the original mutate
369    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(append.getTimestamp());
370    mutateBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(append.getTimeRange()));
371    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.APPEND, append));
372  }
373
374  /**
375   * Older clients may not send along a timestamp in the MutationProto. Check that we default
376   * correctly.
377   */
378  @Test
379  public void testAppendNoTimestamp() throws IOException {
380    MutationProto mutation = getAppendMutation(null);
381    Append append = ProtobufUtil.toAppend(mutation, null);
382    assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, append.getTimestamp());
383    append.getFamilyCellMap().values().forEach(cells -> cells
384      .forEach(cell -> assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, cell.getTimestamp())));
385  }
386
387  private MutationProto getAppendMutation(Long timestamp) {
388    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
389    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
390    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.APPEND);
391    if (timestamp != null) {
392      mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
393    }
394    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
395    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
396    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
397    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
398    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v1"));
399    if (timestamp != null) {
400      qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
401    }
402    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
403    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
404    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v2"));
405    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
406    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
407
408    return mutateBuilder.build();
409  }
410
411  private static ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder createProcedureBuilder(long procId) {
412    ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder builder = ProcedureProtos.Procedure.newBuilder();
413    builder.setProcId(procId);
414    builder.setClassName("java.lang.Object");
415    builder.setSubmittedTime(0);
416    builder.setState(ProcedureProtos.ProcedureState.RUNNABLE);
417    builder.setLastUpdate(0);
418
419    return builder;
420  }
421
422  private static ProcedureProtos.Procedure createProcedure(long procId) {
423    return createProcedureBuilder(procId).build();
424  }
425
426  private static LockServiceProtos.LockedResource createLockedResource(
427    LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType resourceType, String resourceName,
428    LockServiceProtos.LockType lockType, ProcedureProtos.Procedure exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure,
429    int sharedLockCount) {
430    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource.Builder build = LockServiceProtos.LockedResource.newBuilder();
431    build.setResourceType(resourceType);
432    build.setResourceName(resourceName);
433    build.setLockType(lockType);
434    if (exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure != null) {
435      build.setExclusiveLockOwnerProcedure(exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure);
436    }
437    build.setSharedLockCount(sharedLockCount);
438
439    return build.build();
440  }
441
442  @Test
443  public void testProcedureInfo() {
444    ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder builder = createProcedureBuilder(1);
445    ByteString stateBytes = ByteString.copyFrom(new byte[] { 65 });
446    BytesValue state = BytesValue.newBuilder().setValue(stateBytes).build();
447    builder.addStateMessage(Any.pack(state));
448    ProcedureProtos.Procedure procedure = builder.build();
449
450    String procJson = ProtobufUtil.toProcedureJson(Lists.newArrayList(procedure));
451    assertEquals("[{" + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"1\","
452      + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\"," + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\","
453      + "\"stateMessage\":[{\"value\":\"QQ==\"}]" + "}]", procJson);
454  }
455
456  @Test
457  public void testServerLockInfo() {
458    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
459      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.SERVER, "server",
460        LockServiceProtos.LockType.SHARED, null, 2);
461
462    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
463    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"SERVER\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"server\","
464      + "\"lockType\":\"SHARED\"," + "\"sharedLockCount\":2" + "}]", lockJson);
465  }
466
467  @Test
468  public void testNamespaceLockInfo() {
469    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
470      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.NAMESPACE, "ns",
471        LockServiceProtos.LockType.EXCLUSIVE, createProcedure(2), 0);
472
473    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
474    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"NAMESPACE\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"ns\","
475      + "\"lockType\":\"EXCLUSIVE\"," + "\"exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure\":{"
476      + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"2\"," + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\","
477      + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\"" + "}," + "\"sharedLockCount\":0" + "}]",
478      lockJson);
479  }

481  @Test

483    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
484      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.TABLE, "table",
485        LockServiceProtos.LockType.SHARED, null, 2);
486
487    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
488    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"TABLE\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"table\","
489      + "\"lockType\":\"SHARED\"," + "\"sharedLockCount\":2" + "}]", lockJson);

492  @Test
493  public void testRegionLockInfo() {
494    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
495      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.REGION, "region",
496        LockServiceProtos.LockType.EXCLUSIVE, createProcedure(3), 0);
497
498    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
499    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"REGION\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"region\","
500      + "\"lockType\":\"EXCLUSIVE\"," + "\"exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure\":{"
501      + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"3\"," + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\","
502      + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\"" + "}," + "\"sharedLockCount\":0" + "}]",
503      lockJson);
504  }
505
506  /**
507   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
508   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
509   * when it contains tags and encode/decode tags is set to true.
510   */
511  @Test
512  public void testCellConversionWithTags() {
513    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
514    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, true);
515    assertNotNull(protoCell);
516
517    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, true);
518    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
519    assertEquals(1, decodedTags.size());
520    Tag decodedTag = decodedTags.get(0);
521    assertEquals(TAG_TYPE, decodedTag.getType());
522    assertEquals(TAG_STR, Tag.getValueAsString(decodedTag));
523  }
524
525  private ExtendedCell getCellWithTags() {
526    Tag tag = new ArrayBackedTag(TAG_TYPE, TAG_STR);
527    ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY);
528    cellBuilder.setRow(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
529    cellBuilder.setFamily(Bytes.toBytes("f1"));
530    cellBuilder.setQualifier(Bytes.toBytes("q1"));
531    cellBuilder.setValue(Bytes.toBytes("value1"));
532    cellBuilder.setType(Cell.Type.Delete);
533    cellBuilder.setTags(Collections.singletonList(tag));
534    return cellBuilder.build();
535  }
536
537  private ExtendedCell getCellFromProtoResult(CellProtos.Cell protoCell, boolean decodeTags) {
538    ExtendedCellBuilder decodedBuilder =
539      ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY);
540    return ProtobufUtil.toCell(decodedBuilder, protoCell, decodeTags);
541  }
542
543  /**
544   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
545   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
546   * when it contains tags and encode/decode tags is set to false.
547   */
548  @Test
549  public void testCellConversionWithoutTags() {
550    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
551    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, false);
552    assertNotNull(protoCell);
553
554    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, false);
555    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
556    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
557  }
558
559  /**
560   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
561   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
562   * when it contains tags and encoding of tags is set to false and decoding of tags is set to true.
563   */
564  @Test
565  public void testTagEncodeFalseDecodeTrue() {
566    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
567    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, false);
568    assertNotNull(protoCell);
569
570    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, true);
571    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
572    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
573  }
574
575  /**
576   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
577   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
578   * when it contains tags and encoding of tags is set to true and decoding of tags is set to false.
579   */
580  @Test
581  public void testTagEncodeTrueDecodeFalse() {
582    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
583    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, true);
584    assertNotNull(protoCell);
585
586    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, false);
587    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
588    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
589  }
590
591  /**
592   * Used to confirm that we only consider truncatedMessage as EOF
593   */
594  @Test
595  public void testIsEOF() throws Exception {
596    for (Method method : InvalidProtocolBufferException.class.getDeclaredMethods()) {
597      if (
598        method.getParameterCount() == 0
599          && method.getReturnType() == InvalidProtocolBufferException.class
600      ) {
601        method.setAccessible(true);
602        InvalidProtocolBufferException e = (InvalidProtocolBufferException) method.invoke(null);
603        assertEquals(method.getName().equals("truncatedMessage"), ProtobufUtil.isEOF(e));
604      }
605    }
606  }
607
608  @Test
609  public void testSlowLogParamsMutationProto() {
610    MutationProto mutationProto =
611      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
612
613    SlowLogParams slowLogParams = ProtobufUtil.getSlowLogParams(mutationProto, false);
614
615    assertTrue(slowLogParams.getParams()
616      .contains(Bytes.toStringBinary(mutationProto.getRow().toByteArray())));
617  }
618
619  @Test
620  public void testSlowLogParamsMutateRequest() {
621    MutationProto mutationProto =
622      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
623    ClientProtos.MutateRequest mutateRequest =
624      ClientProtos.MutateRequest.newBuilder().setMutation(mutationProto)
625        .setRegion(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.newBuilder()
626          .setType(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME)
627          .setValue(ByteString.EMPTY).build())
628        .build();
629
630    SlowLogParams slowLogParams = ProtobufUtil.getSlowLogParams(mutateRequest, false);
631
632    assertTrue(slowLogParams.getParams()
633      .contains(Bytes.toStringBinary(mutationProto.getRow().toByteArray())));
634  }

636  @Test
637  public void testGetShortTextFormatNull() {
638    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(null);
639    assertNotNull(actual);
640    assertEquals("null", actual);
641  }
642
643  @Test
644  public void testGetShortTextFormatScanRequest() {
645    ClientProtos.ScanRequest.Builder builder = ClientProtos.ScanRequest.newBuilder();
646    builder.setRegion(REGION);
647    ClientProtos.ScanRequest scanRequest = builder.build();
648
649    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(scanRequest);
650
651    assertNotNull(actual);
652    assertEquals("region { type: REGION_NAME value: \"test\" }", actual);
653  }
654
655  @Test
656  public void testGetShortTextFormatRegionServerReportRequest() {
657    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerReportRequest.Builder builder =
658      RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerReportRequest.newBuilder();
659    builder.setServer(SERVER_NAME);
660    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerReportRequest request = builder.build();
661
662    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(request);
663
664    assertNotNull(actual);
665    assertEquals("server host_name: \"a.b.com\" load { numberOfRequests: 0 }", actual);
666  }
667
668  @Test
669  public void testGetShortTextFormatRegionServerStartupRequest() {
670    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerStartupRequest.Builder builder =
671      RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerStartupRequest.newBuilder();
672    builder.setPort(8080);
673    builder.setServerCurrentTime(111111L);
674    builder.setServerStartCode(15L);
675    builder.setUseThisHostnameInstead("some-host-name");
676    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerStartupRequest regionServerStartupRequest =
677      builder.build();
678
679    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(regionServerStartupRequest);
680
681    assertNotNull(actual);
682    assertEquals("port: 8080 server_start_code: 15 server_current_time: 111111"
683      + " use_this_hostname_instead: \"some-host-name\"", actual);
684  }
685
686  @Test
687  public void testGetShortTextFormatMutationProto() {
688    MutationProto mutationProto =
689      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
690
691    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(mutationProto);
692
693    assertNotNull(actual);
694    assertEquals("row=row123, type=APPEND", actual);
695  }
696
697  @Test
698  public void testGetShortTextFormatGetRequest() throws IOException {
699    ClientProtos.GetRequest getRequest = ClientProtos.GetRequest.newBuilder().setRegion(REGION)
700      .setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(new Get(Bytes.toBytes("foo")))).build();
701
702    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(getRequest);
703
704    assertNotNull(actual);
705    assertEquals("region= test, row=foo", actual);
706  }
707
708  @Test
709  public void testGetShortTextFormatMultiRequest() throws IOException {
710    ClientProtos.Action action = ClientProtos.Action.newBuilder()
711      .setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(new Get(Bytes.toBytes("foo")))).build();
712    ClientProtos.RegionAction regionAction =
713      ClientProtos.RegionAction.newBuilder().addAction(action).setRegion(REGION).build();
714
715    ClientProtos.MultiRequest multiRequest =
716      ClientProtos.MultiRequest.newBuilder().addRegionAction(regionAction).build();
717
718    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(multiRequest);
719
720    assertNotNull(actual);
721    assertEquals("region= test, for 1 action(s) and 1st row key=foo", actual);
722  }
723
724  @Test
725  public void testGetShortTextFormatMutateRequest() throws IOException {
726    ClientProtos.MutateRequest mutateRequest = ClientProtos.MutateRequest.newBuilder()
727      .setMutation(
728        ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, new Increment(Bytes.toBytes("foo"))))
729      .setRegion(REGION).build();
730
731    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(mutateRequest);
732
733    assertNotNull(actual);
734    assertEquals("region= test, row=foo", actual);
735  }
736
737  @Test
738  public void testGetShortTextFormatCoprocessorServiceRequest() {
739    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall call = ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.newBuilder()
740      .setRow(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes("foo"))).setMethodName("awesomeMethod")
741      .setServiceName("awesomeService")
742      .setRequest(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes("foo-request"))).build();
743
744    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest.Builder builder =
745      ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest.newBuilder();
746    builder.setRegion(REGION);
747    builder.setCall(call);
748    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest coprocessorServiceRequest = builder.build();
749
750    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(coprocessorServiceRequest);
751
752    assertNotNull(actual);
753    assertEquals("coprocessorService= awesomeService:awesomeMethod", actual);
754  }
755
756  @Test
757  public void testGetShortTextFormatMoveRegionRequest() {
758    MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest.Builder builder = MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest.newBuilder();
759    builder.setRegion(REGION);
760    builder.setDestServerName(SERVER_NAME);
761    MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest moveRegionRequest = builder.build();
762
763    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(moveRegionRequest);
764
765    assertNotNull(actual);
766    assertEquals(
767      "region { type: REGION_NAME value: \"test\" } dest_server_name { host_name: \"a.b.com\" }",
768      actual);
769  }
